subject: B2B
description_text:
hello  i hope you are good
we are from Greece and we are starting a new business for the sim racing
fans. We are going to start with an e-shop and in a few months we hope that
we will find the best place to have a physical store.
We would like to know if you want a seller in greece for you're products
Thank you for you're time
Have a nice day

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 5299。
